scripts.env-install: dpkg --print-architecture; echo ==1==; dpkg --print-foreign-architectures; echo ==2==; sudo dpkg --add-architecture i386; echo =3==; dpkg --print-foreign-architectures; echo =4==; sudo apt update -y; echo ==5==; npm run wine-install-ubuntu20-ok
scripts.wine-install-ubuntu20-1: sudo dpkg --add-architecture i386; sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 86B72ED9;sudo add-apt-repository 'deb [arch=amd64] https://mirror.mxe.cc/repos/apt focal main';sudo apt -qq update;sudo apt install -y --allow-downgrades libpcre2-8-0=10.34-7;sudo apt install wine32 wine64 -y
scripts.wine-install-ubuntu20-2: sudo rm -f /etc/apt/sources.list.d/microsoft-prod.list;sudo dpkg --add-architecture i386;sudo apt-get update -qq;sudo apt-get install -yqq --allow-downgrades binutils-mingw-w64-x86-64 g++-mingw-w64-x86-64 libc6:i386 libgcc-s1:i386 libstdc++6:i386 mingw-w64 wine-stable;sudo apt install wine32 wine64 -y
scripts.wine-install-ubuntu20-ok: sudo apt install libc6:i386 libstdc++6:i386 libgcc-s1:i386 libicu70:i386; sudo apt install wine32 wine64 -y
scripts.make-all: npm run make-linux-x64; npm run make-darwin-x64; npm run make-win-x64
scripts.make-linux-x64: echo '== LINUX X64 =='; npm run copy-rg-linux-x64; electron-forge make --platform linux --arch x64
scripts.make-darwin-arm64: echo '== DARWIN ARM64 =='; npm run copy-rg-darwin-both; electron-forge make --platform darwin --arch arm64
scripts.make-darwin-x64: echo '== DARWIN X64 =='; npm run copy-rg-darwin-both; electron-forge make --platform darwin --arch x64
scripts.make-win-x64: echo '== WINDOWS X64 =='; npm run copy-rg-win-x64; electron-forge make --platform win32 --arch x64
